ðŸ“° News we're reading
â€¢ Order your Thanksgiving pies, treats now in Stark County (timesreporter.com) â€” Local bakeries in North Canton are preparing for Thanksgiving by offering a variety of delicious pies and treats. Residents can pre-order their favorites for pickup just in time for the holiday, ensuring a sweet addition to their celebrations.
â€¢ Kristallnacht speakers see bright future (clevelandjewishnews.com) â€” At the Kol Israel Foundation's annual event, panelists highlighted the importance of Holocaust education, particularly in North Canton City Schools. They expressed hope for the future despite rising antisemitism, emphasizing the need for effective education to combat hate.
